animeTitle: So I am the Ancestor of the Demonic Path
otherNames: So I am the Ancestor of the Demonic Path?, So I am the Ancestor of the Demonic Path, 原来我是魔道老祖？, So I am the ancestor of the devil?, 原来我是魔道老祖？动态漫画第1季, 原来我是魔道老祖？
synopsis: Yun Tian, a generation of experts, faced decline as his lifespan depleted. The eight Holy Realms, self-proclaimed champions of the righteous path, learned about Yun Tian’s imminent end and besieged the mountain gate. In a critical moment, a time-traveler with the same name as Yun Tian, carrying a system soul, crossed over and embarked on a challenging journey to punish evil and promote the righteous path. Yun Tian, by completing system tasks to earn points, exchanged points for lifespan, leading six disciples to gradually reclaim the ancestral treasures and legacies that belonged to their sect. Step by step, they unveiled the obscure past in the dark corners of the eight realms. With his peak strength and the soul of justice, all schemes and mysteries shattered into the dawn’s light.
